dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT sgr.remark_text, gu.gl_user_xid insert_user, TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(sgr.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY HH:MI PM') note_time FROM ship_group_refnum sgref INNER JOIN ship_group_remark sgr ON sgref.ship_group_gid = sgr.ship_group_gid AND sgr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.INTERNAL NOTES' INNER JOIN gl_user gu ON sgr.insert_user = gu.gl_user_gid WHERE sgref.ship_group_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' AND sgref.ship_group_refnum_value = :BOOKING_ID ORDER BY sgr.insert_date ASC
